name: Puppy Catch
description:
Controls

  • right/left arrow: run
  • up arrow/space: jump/throw bone
  • R to Restart (If you find bugs)

Who let the puppy out?

Your goal is to pick up the bone, throw the bone into the dog house and go into the dog house to complete the level.

Move boxes to get to the bone.

Make sure you throw the bone with the right force.

The game is a contribution to Trijam #104: The 3 hour game jam

Theme: Who let the dogs out?

* all assets were created within the trijam and can be freely used for any future commercial or non-commercial project: https://jinxedbyte.itch.io/1bit-dog-puppy
